definitions.definition: Introduces a clause with negative polarity , often one which upsets the listener's expectations.

subdefinitions.definition: Under the condition that; but . (clarification of this definition is needed)
examples: You're welcome to borrow my bicycle, only please take care of it.

subdefinitions.definition: But , except ; but in fact . (clarification of this definition is needed)
examples: I would enjoy running, only I have this broken leg.
She would get good results only she gets nervous.
You look like me, only shorter.

main_definition: ( informal , clause-initial ) Introduces a clause with negative polarity , often one which upsets the listener's expectations.
